tgt: Mueletshedzi wa zwa Tsireledzo wa Lushaka wa Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa, Phrofesa Vho Fholisani Sydney Mufamadi, vha ḓo dzhenela Guvhangano ḽa zwa Mulalo, ḽo vhidzwaho nga Phresidennde Vho Zelenksy, ḽine ḽa ḓo farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Copenhagen, kha ḽa Denmark, nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src: Khabinete yi lemuke tinhlayo ta mabindzu ta sweswinyana tanihilaha ti andlariweke hakona hi Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu, vumaki na Mphikizano leti kombeke leswaku tinhundzu ta Afrika-Dzonga leti rhumeriwaka eChina ti fike eka US$33 wa tibiliyoni hi 2022, hi kambirhi kutlula levhele ya mutirhisani wo bindzurisa lonkulu kutlula hinkwavo, Jarimani.
tgt: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha zwa uri mbalombalo dza zwa mbambadzo dza zwenezwino dzo bviswaho nga Muhasho wa zwa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Mbambe dzo sumbedza uri zwivhambadzelwannḓa zwa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwo rumelwaho kha ḽa China zwo vhuedza masheleni a swikaho 33 biḽioni US$ nga ṅwaha wa 2022, he zwa fhira kavhili tshikalo tsha zwa shango ḽa Germany ḽine ḽa vha mushumisani muhulwane a tevhelaho kha zwa mbambadzo na shango ḽashu.

src: Hi ku angarhela, mabindzu ya Afrika-Dzonga-China ya tlakuke hi 30% kusuka eka US$44 wa tibiliyoni hi 2018 kufika eka US$57wa tibiliyoni hi kuhela ka 2022.
tgt: Nga u tou angaredza, mbambadzo vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa China yo engedzea nga 30% u bva kha 44 biḽioni US$ nga ṅwaha wa 2018 ya gonyela nṱha kha 57 biḽioni US$ mafheloni a ṅwaha wa 2022.

src: Kusukela 2018 kufikela 2022, mipimo ya ku kula ya lembe na lembe ya nhlayoxikarhi ya 10% (tinhundzu leti rhumeriwaka ematikweni mambe) na 4.5% (tinhundzu leti xaviweke ematikweni) yi tsarisiwile.
tgt: U bva ṅwaha wa 2018 u swika wa 2022, ho rekhodiwa 10% ya phimo ya vhukati ya nyaluwo ya ṅwaha kha zwivhambadzelwannḓa khathihi na 4.5% ya zwiṱunḓwa.

src: Khabinete yi amukele ntwanano lowu wu nga ta endla leswaku Mozambique yi amukela Afrika-Dzonga hi 100 wa timegawati (MW) ta gezi endzeni ka tin'hweti tinharhu (3) leti landzelaka xikan'wekan'we loko ku sayiniwa Ntwanano wa ku Xaviwa ka Gezi.
tgt: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelano ine shango ḽa Mozambique ḽa ḓo ṋetshedza Afrika Tshipembe muḓagasi wa 100 megawatsi (MW) kha miṅwedzi miraru i ḓaho musi ho sainiwa Thendelano ya Thengo ya Muḓagasi.

src: Tin'hweti tinharhu kufika eka 12 leti landzelaka ti ta endla leswaku Afrika-Dzonga yi xava kusuka eka matiko mambe kufika eka 1 000 MW ta gezi kusuka eMozambique.
tgt: Kha miṅwedzi miraru u ya kha ya 12, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo vha ḽi tshi khou wana muḓagasi wa u swika kha 1 000 MW u bva kha ḽa Mozambique.

src: Khabinete yi yile emahlweni yi amukela antswiso lowu yaka emahlweni eka ntalo wa ku endliwa ka gezi Eskom lowu wu tiyisiseke leswaku nhlangano wo phakela miganga gezi wu tsarisa 60% ta Xiphemu xa Vukona bya Eneji.
tgt: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza u khwinisea hune ha khou vhonala kha vhubveledzi ha muḓagasi wa Eskom he ha vha na khonadzeo ya u bveledzwa ha fulufulu ḽi swikaho 60% kha giridi nga u angaredza (EAF).

src: Khabinete yi hundzise ku khensa ka yona eka vanhu va le Afrika-Dzonga eka vuhoxaxandla bya n'wina eka ku hunguta ku laviwa ka gezi, leswi swi hoxekeke xandla eka Eskom ku va yi kota ku hlayisa switeji swa le hansi swa ku tirhisiwa ka gezi hi ku siyerisana.
tgt: Khabinethe i khou livhisa ndivhuwo dzayo kha vhathu vha Afrika Tshipembe nge vha shela mulenzhe kha zwa u fhungudza ṱhoḓea ya muḓagasi, zwe zwa ita uri Eskom i kone u fhungudza tshoṱhe maitele a zwa u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga u sielisana.

src: Khabinete yi hundzise ku khensa eka munyikelo eAfrika-Dzonga hi Rhiphabuliki ya Vanhu ya China ya xilamulelamhangu na switirhisiwa swo endla gezi swa mpimo lowutsongo leswi nga na nkoka R167 wa timiliyoni.
tgt: Khabinethe yo ṱahisa maipfi ayo a ndivhuwo kha ndambedzo ye ya ṋetshedzwa Afrika Tshipembe nga shango ḽa China ya u thusa kha zwishumiswa zwa vhubveledzi ha muḓagasi muṱuku na wa shishi i swikaho R167 miḽioni.

src: Mali yi le ku hlengeletiweni eka xiyimo xin'wana lexi vuaki byi nga ta sunguriwa hi Mudyaxihi 2024, ku ri na ku hetisiwa loku kunguhateriweke ku va hi Eka xinakulobye exikarhi ka mfumo na sekitara ya vucelamigodi, vuaki byi le ku endlekeni eka phurojeke ya Nhluvukiso wa Swipfuno swa Mati swa Nambu wa Olifants ya R24 wa tibiliyoni eLimpopo, ku ri na ku hetiwa loku languteriwaka hi Eka xinakulobye xo fana hi migodi leyi nga eKapa-N'walungu, vuaki byi ta sungula endzhakunyana ka lembe leri eka phurojeke ya Vaal Gamagara ya R10 ra tibiliyoni laha ku hetiwa na kona ku languteriwaka kwalomuya ka Vuaki byi sungule n'hweti yaleyi, Khotavuxika 2023, eka Phurojeke yo Engetela Mati ya Groot Letaba eLimpopo, leyi yi khumbaka ku tlakusiwa ka Damu Tzaneen.
tgt: U fhaṱwa ha Luṱa lwa 2 lwa Thandela ya Maḓi ya Lesotho Highlands ya masheleni a swikaho R40 biḽioni ine ya ḓo thusa nga nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng na maṅwe mavunḓu a nga tsini.

src: Ntirho eka phurojeke leyi wu ta hetiwa hi EKapa-Vupeladyambu, vuaki byi ta sungula hi 2024 eka Xikimi xo Engetela xa Voëlvlei xa R1,2 wa tibiliyoni, laha ku hetiwa ku languteriwa hi 2026.
tgt: Mushumo uyo u ḓo fhela nga ṅwaha wa Luṱa lwa 2 lwa Thandela ya Mokolo Crocodile Water Augmentation ya masheleni a swikaho R4 biḽioni ngei vunḓuni ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela na Limpopo.

src: Ku pasisiwa ka Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo Bangi ya Poso leyi nga na Vutihlamuleri Khabinete yi amukele ku pasisiwa ka Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Bangi ya Poso leyi nga na Vutihlamuleri hi Palamende (havumbirhi bya Huvo ya Rixaka na Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzakulu), leswi pfulaka ndlela ya ku nyikiwa ka layisense ya bangi ya mfumo.
tgt: U tendelwa ha Khwiniso ya Mulayotibe wa Postbank Limited Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza u tendelwa ha Khwiniso ya Mulayotibe wa Postbank Limited nga Phalamennde (ya Buthano ḽa Lushaka na Khoro ya Lushaka ya Mavunḓu), zwe zwa vula nḓila ya u ita uri hu kone u vha na bannga ya muvhuso.

src: Nawumbisi lowu wu tirhana na mixungeto leyi eka nkarhi wa sweswi yi fambelanisiwaka na xivumbeko xa nkarhi wa sweswi xa Bangi ya Poso, hi ku hundzuluxa vun'wini na xivumbeko xo vika ku tumbuluxa khamphani yo lawula yintshwa ya Bangi ya Poso.
tgt: Mulayotibe uyu u amba nga ha khombo dzine zwa zwino dzi ṱumana na tshivhumbeo tsha Postbank, u khwinisa muhanga wa vhulangi na muvhigo u itela u ḓo thoma khamphani ntswa ine ya do fara mikovhe na vhulanguli ha Postbank.

src: Khabinete yi ta rindzela Phuresidente ku sayina tanihi nawu lowu wu nga ta pfumelela ntsariso wa Bangi ya Poso tanihi Khamphani yo Lawula Bangi.
tgt: Khabinethe i ḓo lindela Phresidennde vha tshi u saina uri u vhe mulayo zwine wa ḓo konisa uri Postbank i kone u redzhisiṱariwa sa Bank Controlling Company.

src: Havexeriso wa Vantshwa.
tgt: U maanḓafhadza Vhaswa.

src: Khabinete yi khense yi khense vanhu va le Afrika-Dzonga eka ku tikatsa eka mitlangelo ya Siku ra Vantshwa ya tiko hi siku ra 16 Khotavuxika 2023 ehansi ka nkongomelo: “Ku hatlisisiwa ka ntshunxeko wa ikhonomi ya vantshwa eka vumundzuku lebyi yisekaka emahlweni”.
tgt: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nge vha dzhenela kha vhuṱambo ha u pembelela Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa nga ḽa 16 Fulwi 2023 fhasi ha ṱhero ine ya ri: “U engedza mbofholowo ya ikonomi kha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ho khwaṱhaho”.

src: Ku Tirha eka Nongoloko wa Ndzilo Khabinete yi losa 400 ya vatimelandzilo va le Afrika-Dzonga lava rhumeriweke eCanada ku pfuneta ku ponisa vutomi, makaya, mabindzu na nhova eka Xifundzakulu xa Alberta xa Canada.
tgt: U Shuma kha Mbekanyamushumo dza zwa Mulilo Khabinethe i khou fhululedza vhorazwidzimamulilo vha Afrika Tshipembe vha 400 vhe vha rumelwa kha ḽa Canada u thusa u phulusa matshilo, miḓi, mabindu na zwimela kha Vunḓu ḽa Alberta ngei kha ḽa Canada.

src: Ku rhumeriwa ka vatirhi ka 2023 i angulo eka xikombelo xa xihatla ku suka eka Senthara ya Ndzilo wa Swihlahla ya le Xikarhi ka Tiejensi ya Canada.
tgt: Uho u ruṅwa ha vhorazwidzimamulilo avho kha u no ṅwaha wa 2023, ho vha u fhindula khumbelo ya shishi yo ṱahiswaho nga vha Senthara ya Canadian Inter-agency Forest Fire.

src: Ntirhisano lowa vuntlhanu exikarhi ka Afrika-Dzonga na Canada i vumbhoni bya vuxaka lebyo tiya exikarhi ka matiko ma ka hina lamambirhi naswona vuhoxaxandla bya Afrika-Dzonga ku hoxa xandla eka ku hlayisa mbangu wa xiviri, swi nga ri na mhaka leswaku i xiphemu xihi xa misava lexi hlaseriwaka hi mixungeto ya mbangu.
tgt: Ṱhanganelano iyi ya vhuṱanu ya vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Canada i tou vha vhuṱanzi ha vhushaka ho khwaṱhaho vhukuma vhune ha vha hone vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili, zwenezwo u shela mulenzhe ha ḽa Africa Tshipembe kha u tsireledza mupo washu, zwi sa ambi uri ndi kha tshipiḓa tsha ḽifhasi tshifhio tsho kwameaho nga tshutshedzo dza zwa mupo.

src: Mitlangu ya Ximumu ya Misava ya Tiolimpiki yo Hlawuleka Xipano xa Afrika-Dzonga xi ya emahlweni xi endla tiko ri tinyungubyisa eka Mitlangu ya Ximumu ya Misava ya Tiolimpiki yo Hlawuleka ya 2023 eBerlin, Jarimani, kusuka 17 kufika 25 Khotavuxika 2023.
tgt: Mitambo ya Tshilimo ya Dzioḽimpiki dzo Khetheaho dza Ḽifhasi Thimu ya Afrika Tshipembe (Team SA) i khou bvela phanḓa na u fhefheḓisa fulaga kha Mitambo ya Tshilimo ya Dzioḽimpiki dzo Khetheaho dza Ḽifhasi dza ṅwaha wa 2023 ya Special Olympics World Summer ngei ḓoroboni ya Berlin, kha ḽa Germany, u bva nga ḽa 17 u swika ḽa 25 Fulwi 2023.

src: Xipano xa Afrika-Dzonga xi vumbiwa hi 64 wa switsutsumi na 21 wa vadzaberi lava va phikizanaka na 7 000 ya switsutsumi kusuka eka 180 wa matiko.
tgt: Thimu ya Afrika Tshipembe yo vhumbwa nga vhoramitambo vha 64 na vhagudisi vha 21 vhane vha khou ṱaṱisana na vhoramitambo vha 7 000 vha bvaho kha mashango a swikaho 180 a lifhasini ḽoṱhe.

src: Swiboho swa Khabinete Ku Amukeriwa ka Afrika-Dzonga ka Milawu ya Luxembourg ya Ntwanano wa Mitsakelo ya Matiko ya Misava eka Switirhisiwa swo Fambafamba hi mayelana na Timhaka leti Kongomanaka na Matorokisi Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xa Milawu ya Swiporo swa Luxembourg ePalamende leswaku xi amukeriwa.
tgt: Tsheo dza Khabinethe Khwaṱhisedzo ya Afrika Tshipembe ya Luxembourg Protocol kha zwa Buthano ḽa Dzangalelo ḽa Dzitshaka kha Zwishumiswa Thendeleki nga ha Mafhungo a Kwamanaho na zwa Railway Rolling Stock Khabinethe yo tendela na u khwaṱhisedza ṋetshedzo ya Luxembourg Rail Protocol Phaḽamenndeni uri i khwaṱhisedzwe.

src: Milawu ya Swiporo ya Luxembourg yi kondletela ku kula ka ikhonomi hi ku tiyisa sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo leyi nyikaka timali eka indasitiri ya swiporo.
tgt: Luxembourg Rail Protocol i susumedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi nga u ṱuṱuwedza zwa u ṋetshedzwa ha masheleni kha sekithara ya phuraivete kha nḓowetshumo ya zwiporo.

src: Milawu ya Swiporo ya Luxembourg i mbuyelo wa ku humelela ka Ntwanano wa Kapa hi mayelana na Mitsakelo ya Matiko ya Misava eka Switirhisiwa swo Fambafamba leyi khomiweke hi 2007.
tgt: Luxembourg Rail Protocol ndi mvelelo dza mvelaphanḓa dza Buthano ḽa Dorobo ya Kapa ḽa Dzangalelo ḽa Dzitshaka kha Zwishumiswa Thendeleki ḽe ḽa farwa nga ṅwaha wa 2007.

src: Afrika-Dzonga yi sayine milawu leyi hi 2022, tanihi xikombo xa hilaha tiko ri tiyimiseleke hakona hi mayelana na antswiso wa swiporo.
tgt: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina maitele aya nga ṅwaha wa 2022, sa tsumbo ya u sumbedza u ḓiimisela ha shango kha zwa mvusuluso ya zwiporo.

src: Ttn Evert Potgieter tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Timali wa Vulawuri byo Lawula Vatirhi va Tindlu.
tgt: Vho Evert Potgieter sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa Masheleni wa zwa Maanḓalanga a zwa Ndaulo ya Vhashumi vha zwa Thundu.

src: Ttn Sandile Psychology Mkhize tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Vurhangerinkulu wa Magalies Water (ku engeteriwa ka kontiraka).
tgt: Vho Sandile Psychology Mkhize sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa Magalies Water (ndi nyengedzedzo ya khonṱiraka).

src: Swirho swa Khansele ya Ndzavisiso wa Vurimi: Mhn Joyene Isaacs (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Poncho Mokaila (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Jonty Tshipa Ttn Neo Harrison Masithela Mhn Clarinda Elizabeth Simpson Dkd Hilke Maartens Ttnr Goodman Gcaba (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Troy Govender
tgt: Miraḓo ya Khoro ya Ṱhoḓisiso ya zwa Vhulimi: Mufumakadzi Vho Joyene Isaacs (vho tou dovha hafhu vha tholwa) Dokotela Vho Poncho Mokaila (vho tou dovha hafhu vha tholwa) Dokotela Vho Jonty Tshipa Vho Neo Harrison Masithela Mufumakadzi Vho Clarinda Elizabeth Simpson Dokotela Vho Hilke Maartens Vho Goodman Gcaba (vho tou dovha hafhu vha tholwa) Dokotela Vho Troy Govender

src: Dkd Konanani Liphadzi (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) Dkd Pieter Naude Malan (ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa) na Dkd Owen Horwood.
tgt: Dokotela Vho Konanani Liphadzi (vho tou dovha hafhu vha tholwa) Dokotela Vho Pieter Naude Malan (vho tou dovha hafhu vha tholwa) na Dokotela Vho Owen Horwood.

src: Ku pfariwa ka swivandla leswi nga eka Ejensi ya Vutleketli bya le Magondzweni exikarhi ka Mindzilekana: Mhn Bukeka Mahlutshana na Ttn Leroy Nsibande.
tgt: U vala zwikhala zwa mushumo kha Zhendedzi ḽa zwa Vhuendi ha Badani Mikaṋoni: Mufumakadzi Vho Bukeka Mahlutshana na Vho Leroy Nsibande.

src: Ttn Tshepo Peege.
tgt: Vho Tshepo Peege.

src: Nawumbisi wa Vukati wa Mpfapfarhuto wa 2022 Khabinete yi pasise ku kandziyisiwa ka Nawumbisi wa Vukati wa Mpfapfarhuto wa 2022 leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo.
tgt: Mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa Mbingano wa ṅwaha wa 2022 Khabinethe yo tendela u anḓadzwa ha Mvatomveto ya Mulayotibe wa Mbingano wa ṅwaha wa 2022 u itela u pfa mihumbulo ya lushaka.

src: Nawumbisi lowu wu humelerisa Phepha ra Swibumabumelo swa Mfumo hi mayelana na Vukati eAfrika-Dzonga, leri ri pasisiweke hi Khabinete hi Nyenyakulu 2022.
tgt: Mulayotibe uyu u khwaṱhisedza Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Mbingano fhano Afrika Tshipembe, ye ya tendelwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe 2022.

src: Nawumbisi wa Ejensi ya Switirhisiwakulu swa Swipfuno swa Mati ya Rixaka (NWRIA) wa 2022.
tgt: Mulayotibe wa Zhendedzi ḽa Themamveledziso ya Zwiko zwa Maḓi a Lushaka (NWRIA) wa ṅwaha wa 2022.

src: Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xa Nawumbisi wa NWRIA wa mpfapfarhuto ePalamende.
tgt: Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha mvetamveto ya mulayotibe wa NWRIA ngei phalamenndeni.

src: Nawumbisi lowu ringanyeta ku simekiwa ka NWRIA leswaku yi va na vutihlamuleri bya nkunguhato, ku nyika timali na nhluvukiso wa switirhisiwakulu swa mati swa tiko leri.
tgt: Mulayotibe uyu u khou gwa uri hu thomiwe NWRIA uri i vhe yone ine ya vha na ndangulo kha zwa vhupulani, masheleni na mveledziso ya themamveledziso ya maḓi kha shango.

src: Yi ta simekiwa tanihi Vandla ra Mfumo ehansi ka Xedulu ya 2 ya Nawu wa Malawulelo ya Timali ta Mfumo, 1999 (Nawu wa 1999).
tgt: Ḽi ḓo dzhiwa sa Tshiimiswa tsha Muvhuso nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu 2 kha Mulayo wa Ndaulo ya Masheleni a Muvhuso, wa ṅwaha wa 1999 (Mulayo 1 wa 1999).

src: Ejensi leyi yi ta byarha mitirho leyi eka nkarhi wa sweswi yi tirhiwa hi Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority.
tgt: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo dzhia mishumo ine zwazwino ya khou itwa nga vha Maanḓalanga a Thanele ya Trans-Caledon.

src: Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wo Dlaya Vukati 2023 Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xa Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wo Dlaya Vukati wa mpfapfarhuto wa 2023 ePalamende.
tgt: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ṱhalano wa ṅwaha wa 2023 Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya ṱhalano wa ṅwaha wa 2023 ngei Phalamenndeni.

src: Nawumbisi lowu wu hundzuluxa Nawu wo Dlaya Vukati, 1979 (Nawu wa 70 wa 1979) ku endlela ku lulamisela tindlela ta ku sirhelela nhlayiseko wa swihlangi kumbe va na lava hlayisiwaka va tswariweke eka vukati bya Ximuzilamu.
tgt: Mulayotibe uyu u khwinisa Mulayo wa Ṱhalano, wa ṅwaha wa 1979 (Mulayo 70 wa 1979) u itela u ṋetshedza maitele a u tsireledza ndondolo ya vhana vha unḓwaho vhe vha bebwa kha mbingano dza Tshimosileme.

src: Mihundzuluxo leyi yi tlhela yi lulamisela ku phakeriwa hi vuntshwa ka rifuwo loko ku n'okisiwa vukati bya Ximuzilamu ku lulamisela ku tekeriwa mivuyelo ya ndzhaka ya vukati bya Ximuzilamu.
tgt: Khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza tea u shumiswa kha zwa u avhelwa ha thundu nga huswa musi mbingano ya Tshimosilemu yo fhaladzwa u shuma kha zwa mbuelo dza mulaifa kha mbingano ya Tshimosilemu.

src: Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa Nkwama wa Mpfuxeto wa Afrika na Ntirhisano wa Matiko ya Misava (ARF) Khabinete yi pasise xiringanyeto xa nkandziyiso wa Nawumbisi wa Hundzuluxo wa mpfapfarhuto wa ARF leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonelo.
tgt: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Tshikwama tsha Tshumisano ya Dzitshaka na u Vusuluswa ha Afrika (ARF) Khabinete yo tendela u anḓadzwa ha Mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa ARF u itela u pfa mihumbulo ya lushaka.

src: Xikongomelo xa Nawumbisi lowu i ku hundzuluxa Nawu wa ARF (Nawu wa 51 wa 2000).
tgt: Ndivho ya mulayotibe uyu ndi u khwinisa Mulayo wa ARF (Mulayo 51 wa ṅwaha wa 2000).

src: Mihundzuluxo leyi yi ta tlhela yi vula leswaku ARF sweswi yi ta vitani Ejensi ya Swinakulobye bya Nhluvukiso wa Afrika-Dzonga.
tgt: Khwiniso iyi i ḓo amba uri ARF zwazwino i vho ḓo thoma u vhidzwa sa Zhendedzi ḽa Vhushumisani ḽa Mveledziso ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src: Ejensi leyi yi ta tirha tanihi xitirho ku lawula, ku seketela na ku humelerisa ntirhisano na mpfuneto wa nhluvukiso lowu fikaka emakumu wa Afrika-Dzonga.
tgt: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo shuma sa tshishumiswa tsha u langa, u tikedza na u tshimbidza thusedzo na tshumisano ya mveledziso dzi no khou khunyeledzwa dza Afrika Tshipembe.

src: ARF i ya nkoka swonghasi eka ku kondletela mitsakelo ya rixaka na mikhuvanene swa Afrika-Dzonga, Mpfuxeto wa Afrika na ku tumbuluxiwa ka misava yo antswa ya hinkwavo.
tgt: ARF ndi ya vhuṱhogwa vhukuma kha u bveledza dzangalelo na ndeme dza lushaka dza ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, u vusuluswa ha Afrika na u bveledza shango ḽavhuḓi kha vhathu vhoṱhe.

src: 2 Samiti ya Ntwanano wo Nyika Timali wa Misava Hinkwayo wuntshwa.1 Phuresidente Ramaphosa hi siku ra 22 na 23 Khotavuxika 2023, u ta teka xiave eka samiti ya ntwanano a ku nyika timali wa misava hinkwayo eFurwa.
tgt: 2 Guvhangano ḽa Thendelano Ntswa ya zwa Masheleni ya Ḽifhasi.1 Nga ḽa 22 na ḽa 23 Fulwi 2023, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo dzhenela guvhangano ḽa thendelano ntswa ya zwa masheleni ya ḽifhasi ngei kha ḽa France.

src: Afrika-Dzonga yi ta tirhana na timhakakulu to tanihi antswiso wa mihlangano ya timali ta nhluvukiso ya matikonyingi, xirilo xa swikweleti, ku nyika timali ka vutumbuluxi, swibalo swa matiko ya misava ma timfanelo to tihumesa to hlawuleka.3 Khomferense ya Khansele ya Vuyimeri ya Vadyondzi (RCL)3.1 Khomferense ya RCL yi ta rhambiwa hi siku ra 29 na 30 Khotavuxika 2023 eYunivhesiti ya Pitori hi xikongomelo xa ku aka na ku tiyisa xiave xa tiRCL eswikolweni.2 Khomferense ya nan'waka yi ta kongomisa eka ku havexerisa vadyondzi, ku kumiwa ka swidingo swa vadyondzi na ku antswisa matirhelo ya tiRCLeyi i pulatifomo ya nkoka ya ku hluvukisa vurhangeri bya nkarhi lowu taka bya tiko leri.4 2023 Thonamente ya Khapi ya Misava ya Netibolo.1 Kha ri na 36 wa Masiku ku ya eka Khapi ya Misava ya Netibolo ya 2023 leyi yi nga ta va kona eCape Town International Convention Centre kusuka 28 Mawuwana kufika 6 Mhawuri 2023, Khabinete yi khense vanhu va le Afrika-Dzonga hinkwavo eka ku amukela ka Vumunhu ka malwandla eka vanhu lava endzeke eka rendzo ra Thirofi ya Khapi ya Misava etikweni hinkwaro.
tgt: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo ṱahisa mafhungo a ndeme a ngaho mbuyedzedzo ya zwiimiswa zwa mveledziso ya zwa masheleni zwa masia o fhambanaho, tshiwo tsha zwikolodo, ndambedzo dza zwa masheleni ntswa, mithelo ya dzitshaka na pfanelo dza u ḓibvisa dzo khetheaho.3 Khonferentsi ya Khoro ya Vhaimeli vha Vhagudiswa (RCL)3.1 Khonferentsi ya RCL i ḓo vha hone nga ḽa 29 na ḽa 30 Fulwi 2023 fhaḽa Yunivesithi ya Pretoria yo sedza kha u fhaṱa na u khwaṱhisa mushumo wa RCL zwikoloni.2 Khonferentsi ya ṋaṅwaha i ḓo sedzesa kha u maanḓafhadza vhagudiswa, u wanulusa ṱhoḓea dza vhagudiswa na u khwinisa mashumele a dziRCHetshi ndi tshifhinga tsha ndeme vhukuma kha u bveledza vharangaphanḓa vha matshelo vha shango ḽashu.4 Muṱaṱisano wa Tshiphuga tsha Ḽifhasi tsha mitambo ya Netibola ya ṅwaha wa 20.1 Musi hu tshe ho tou sala maḓuvha a 36 u swika kha Mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Netibolo ya Ḽifhasi ya ṅwaha wa 2023 ine ya ḓo farelwa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Dzitshaka ine ya vha fhaḽa Ḓoroboni ya Kapa u bva nga ḽa 28 Fulwana u swika ḽa 06 Ṱhangule 2023, Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe kha u kona u ṱanganedza vhueni nga muya wa Ubuntu vhune ha khou enda vhu tshi ṱana Khaphu ya Ḽifhasi u mona na mashango ḽoṱhe.

src: Rendzo lera thirofi ri sungule eKwaZulu-Natal naswona ri ta nghena hi le Gauteng, Mpumalanga, Limpopo, N'walungu-Vupeladyambu, Free State, Kapa-N'walungu na Kapa Vupeladyambu.
tgt: Vhuendedzwamashango ha Khaphu ho thoma ngei vunḓuni ḽa KwaZulu-Natal nahone i ḓo tshimbidzwa u swika na kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, Mpumalanga, Limpopo, Devhula Vhukovhela, Free State, Kapa Devhula na Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha.

src: Rendzo leri ri ta gimeta eKapa-Vupeladyambu tanihi xifundza lexi rhurhelaka, ku nga si sungula thonamente leyi hi siku ra 28 Mawuwana 2023.5 Banyana Banyana va suka ku ya eka Khapi ya Misava ya FIFA ya Vavasati.1 Hi ku yimela rixaka, Khabinete yi navelele leswinene eka xipano xa bolo ya milenge ya vavasati ya rixaka, Banyana Banyana, tanihiloko xi ri eku lulamiseleni ku suka hi Ravuntlhanu 23 Khotavuxika 2023, kuya eka Khapi ya Misava ya FIFA ya Vavasati leyi yi nga ta khomeriwa eAustralia na le New Zealand hi Mawuwana.2 Matirhelo ya xipano eka tithonamente to hambanahambana ma tisile nkongomiso wa miehleketo wa misava hinkwayo eka nhluvukiso wa ntlangu wa vavasati eAfrika-Dzonga, tanihi xiphemu xa vutihavexerisi byo angarhela havexeriso wa rixaka wa vavasati etikweni.
tgt: Madalo ayo a ḓo khunyelela ngei Kapa Vhukovhela sa izwi ḽi ḽone vunḓu ḽine ha khou farwa khaḽo mitambo, musi mitambo i sa athu thoma nga ḽa 28 Fulwana 2023.U dzhenela ha thimu ya Banyana Banyana kha Mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Bola ya Milenzhe ya Vhafumakadzi ya Ḽifhasi Ho imelwa lushaka lwoṱhe, Khabinethe i tama u ṱahisa maipfi a u tamela mashudu kha thimu ya lushaka ya bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi, Banyana Banyana, musi vha tshi khou ḓilugisela u takuwa nga Ḽavhuṱanu ḽa 23 Fulwi 2023, vha tshi ya u tamba Mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Bola ya Milenzhe ya Vhafumakadzi ya Ḽifhasi ine ya ḓo farelwa ngei Australia na New Zealand nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana.4 Mashumele a thimu kha miṱaṱisano yo fhambanaho o kunga nnyi na nnyi kha mveledziso ya mitambo ya vhafumakadzi kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, sa tshipiḓa tshihulwane tsha u ḓimaanḓafhadza na u maanḓafhadza kha zwa matshilisano a vhafumakadzi kha shango.

src: VuhoyozeriKhabinete yi hundzise vuhoyozeri bya yona na ku navelela leswinene eka: Vatlangi va thenisi va tiwhilichere va le Afrika-Dzonga Donald Ramphadi na Kgothatso Montjane lava va humeleleke tanihi tinghwazi ta Grand Slam eka swiavo swo vona hi ku hambana eka thonamente ya Roland Garros yo xiximeka eFurwa.
tgt: U fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela milaedza yayo ya u fhululedza na u tamela mashudu kha: Vhatambi vha thenisi ya wiḽitshee vha Afrika Tshipembe Vho Donald Ramphadi na Vho Kgothatso Montjane vhe vha vhonala vhe vhone dzingweṋa dza Grand Slam kha khethekanyo dzavho dzo fhambanaho kha miṱaṱisano ya nṱha ya Roland Garros ngei France.

src: Vahluri hinkwavo va Matsambu ya Comrade ya 2023 na switsutsumi leswi swi teke xiave eka matsambukulu yo rhelela kusuka ePietermaritzburg kufika Durban.
tgt: Vhawini vhoṱhe vha 2023 Comrade Marathon na vhagidimi vhe vha dzhenela mbambe u swika mafheloni u bva Pietermaritzburg u swika Durban.

src: Hi hoyozela Tete Dijana na Gerda Steyn kungari eka ku hlula ntsena misayano ya vavanuna na ya vavasati hi ku hambana ka vona, kambe na ku tlhela va tshova tirhekodo to rhelela eka havumbirhi bya misiyano ya vavanuna na ya vavasati.
tgt: Ri fhululedza Vho Tete Dijana na Vho Gerda Steyn kha u sa tou wina fhedzi mbambe ya vhanna na ya vhafumakadzi, fhedzi kha u vunḓa rekhodo ya mbambe dzenedzo vhuvhili hadzo ya vhanna na ya vhafumakadzi.

src: Mhn P Khoza loyi a hlawuriweke tanihi Phuresidente wa Huvo ya ICAO ya 42 leyi yi veke kona kusuka 27 Ndzati ku fika 7 Nhlangula eMontreal, Canada Michavelelo Khabinete yi hundzise michavelelo ya yona eka ndyangu na vanghana va: Xirho xa Palamende, Mhn Tina Joemat-Pettersson, loyi a ri Mutshamaxitulu wa Komiti ya Photifoliyo ya Huvo ya Rixaka hi mayelana na Maphorisa, naswona loyi eka nkarhi lowu nga hundza a tirha tanihi Holobye wa Vurimi, Swihlahla, na Tinhlampfi na Holobye wa Eneji.
tgt: Kha Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa, vhathu vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe u ya nga vhukale havho vha tea u guda nga ha ndeme na mbuelo dza matshilele a re na mutakalo nga kha havha mudzulapo vha mualuwa.

src: I-JET, eyasekwa ngonyaka wama-2020, ijolise ekuphumezeni ukukhutshwa kwekhabhoni "ye-Net Zero" ngonyaka wama-2050.
tgt: JET, ye ya thomiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2020, yo livhiswa kha u swikela “Net Zero” ya muhasaladzo wa khaboni nga ṅwaha wa 2050.

src: Urhulumente kunye nemibutho yoncedo iyaqhubeka nokubonelela ngoncedo olukhawulezileyo kuluntu oluchaphazelekileyo KwaZulu-Natala, kuquka iipasile zokutya, iingubo zokulala, iingubo zeplasitiki kunye neebhokisi zikaxakeka.
tgt: Muvhuso na madzangano a zwa vhuthu vha khou bvela phanḓa na u ṋetshedza thuso ya nḓisedzo ya zwishumiswa zwa shishi kha zwitshavha zwo kwameaho kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal, zwine zwishumiswa izwi zwa katela zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa, mabai, mapuḽasitiki a u putela na mabogisi a shishi.

src: Utyelelo lokuSebenza ebeliQhutywe ngokuBambisana yi-Netherlands ne-Denmark IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lokuSebenza ngokuManyeneyo olube yimpumelelo phakathi kweNkulumbuso yase-Netherlands, uMnu Mark Rutte kunye neNkulumbuso yase-Denmark, uNks Mette Frederiksen oluqinise ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika nala mazwe mabini kwimiba yehaydrojini engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, amandla ahlaziyekayo kunye ne-JEUtyelelo kwakhona lwazisa iqela labatyali-mali eMzantsi Afrika ukuqinisa amanqanaba aphezulu entsebenziswano kunye nobudlelwane obuhle phakathi kwelizwe kunye namaqabane amabini abalulekileyo aseYurophu.
tgt: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza fhungo ḽa u tshimbila zwavhuḓi ha Madalo a Mushumo o Ṱanganelaho a vhukati ha Minisṱa Muhulu wa shango ḽa Netherlands, Vho Mark Rutte na Minisṱa Muhulu wa shango ḽa Denmark, Mufumakadzi Vho Mette Frederiksen e a khwaṱhisa vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na aya maṅwe mashango mavhili kha masia a zwa gesemaḓi dala, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho khathihi na JEMadalo aya o dovha hafhu a ḓisa tshigwada tsha vhabindudzi fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe u itela u khwaṱhisa maimo a nṱha a tshumisano khathihi na vhushaka havhuḓi vhukati ha shango ḽashu khathihi na aya mashango a Yuropa ane a vha vhashumisani vhashu vha ndeme.

src: Imbizo kaMongameli yeNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweZithili yaKwaZulu-Natala (i-DDM) UMongameli Ramaphosa, edibene neenkokheli eziphuma kuwo omathathu amanqanaba oburhulumente (kuzwelonke, kwiphondo nakwingingqi), bathabathe iMbizo kaMongameli yesiXhenxe ye-DDM yoLawulo lweSithandathu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-30 kweyeSilimela 2023 kuMasipala weSithili uThukela KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt: Nga tshifhinga tsha nyambedzano dza tshiofisi dzo ṱanganelaho, ho swika he ha sainwa Memorandamu wa Thendelano kha zwa Sia ḽa Gesemaḓi Dala vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Netherlands, ngeno nga thungo ho khwinifhadzwa thendelano ya vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Denmark ya nga ha Tshumisano ya Mveledziso musi hu tshi tevhelwa Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhushaka ha zwa Fulufulu ya ṅwaha wa Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki ya vunḓu ḽa KwaZulu-Natal (DDM) Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa, khathihi na vhaṅwe vharangaphanḓa u bva kha masia oṱhe a muvhuso vhuraru hao (muvhuso wa lushaka, wa vunḓu na muvhuso wapo), vho fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha DDM ya vhu7 kha Muvhuso uno wa Vhurathi nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 30 Fulwi 2023 fhaḽa kha Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki wa uThukela kha vunḓu ḽa KwaZulu-Natal.

src: IHaydrojini Engenabungozi kokusiNgqongileyo IKhabhinethi iphinde yasamkela isibhengezo esihlangeneyo senjongo yokuseka uMbutho waBasebenzi beHaydrojini eMzantsi Afrika naseJamani, esatyikitywa nguMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli ojongene noMbane, uGq Kgosientsho Ramokgopa kunye noSekela-Tshansela waseJamani u-Robert Habeck.
tgt: Mbekanyamushumo iyi yo ita uri vhunzhi ha vhathu vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vha kone u shela mulenzhe kha mishumo ya vhukuma khathihi na u wana mbuelo nga ṅwedzi.

src: IKhabhinethi iluqaphele uTyelelo loMsebenzi lukaMongameli u-Ramaphosa oluya kwiNgqungquthela yeSibhozo yeeNtloko zeMibuso nooRhulumente ye-SACU ebibanjelwe eBukhosini baseSwatini ngoLwesine, umhla wama-29 kweyeSilimela 2023.
tgt: Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Mashango na Mivhuso ya Mbumbano ya zwa Vhupfukamikaṋo ya Mashango a Tshipembe ha Afrika (SACU) Khabinethe yo dzhiela nzhele Madalo a u Shuma a Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa kha Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Mashango na Mivhuso wa SACU ya vhu8 we wa farelwa fhaḽa Eswatini nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 29 Fulwi 2023.

src: I-SACU eyasekwa ngo-1910, yeyona Manyano yezoRhwebo endala ehlabathini.
tgt: SACU, ye ya tumbulwa nga ṅwaha wa 1910, ndi Mbumbano ya zwa Mithelo ya kalesa ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe.

src: Le ngqungquthela yaxoxa yaza yanikezela ngohlaziyo ngobume bokuphunyezwa kwesiCwangciso-qhinga se-SACU sonyaka wama-2022 ukuya kowama-2027.
tgt: Ho vha na nyambedzano kha muṱangano uyu ha dovha hafhu ha ḓivhadzwa zwiswa nga ha tshiimo tsha u thoma u shumiswa ha Pulane dza Maano dza SACU dza ṅwaha wa 2022 u swika 2027.

src: IsiCwangciso-qhinga se-SACU samkelwa ngenyanga yeSilimela ngonyaka wama-2022 njengomgaqo wokwenza nzulu ukudityaniswa kommandla kuManyano yezoRhwebo kunye nokwakha ubudlelwane obuluqilima phakathi kwamazwe amahlanu angamalungu kwakunye nokusebenzisa amathuba aveliswe ngukuRhwebelana koMmandla we-Afrika okungaHlawulisi iRhafu.
tgt: Idzi Pulane dza Maano dza SACU dzo ṱanganedzwa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 2022 sa yone nḓila ya u khwaṱhisa zwa u ṱanganelana ha dzingu kha zwa Mbumbano ya zwa Mithelo khathihi na u bvela phanḓa na u vhumba vhushaka ho khwaṱhaho vhukati ha mashango aya maṱanu ane a vha mirado hu tshi katelwa na u shumisa tshikhala tshi bveledzwaho nga Vhupo ha Mbambadzo dzo Vhofhololwaho dza Dzhango ḽa Afrika.

src: UMnu Sibusiso Bukhosini njengeGosa eliyiNtloko yesiGqeba ye-Isimangaliso Wetland Park Authority (uqeshiwe kwakhona).UNks Tamlyn Bouwer njengeGosa eliPhethe i-Ofisi yeMali yeBhunga leSizwe lokuBhalisa abaKhi bezindlu.
tgt: Mufumakadzi Vho Ntomboxolo Mbengashe sa Muofisiri Mulangi Muhulwane (CEO) wa Post Bank ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miṱanu.

src: UMnu Morongwa Calvin Molongoana njengoSekela Mlawuli-Jikelele (u-DDG): kwicandelo le-Statistics Support and Informatics kwiZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika.
tgt: Vho Sibusiso Bukhosini sa CEO wa Maanḓalanga a Phakha ya Maroroma a Isimangaliso (vho tou dovha u tholwa hafhu).

src: UNks Daphne Yandiswa Morudu njengo-DDG: INkqubo yeeNkcukacha-manani yeSizwe yaseMzantsi Afrika kwiZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika UMnu Rory Gallocher njengeGosa eliPhezulu leMisebenzi kuBongameli.
tgt: Mufumakadzi Vho Tamlyn Bouwer sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa zwa Masheleni wa Khoro ya zwa Vhuḓiṅwalisi ha Vhafhaṱi vha Dzinnḓu.

src: UMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo wonyaka wama-2023 weeNkampani IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weeNkampani wonyaka wama-2023 ukuze uqwalaselwe.
tgt: Mvetamveto ya Khwiniso ya Mulayotibe wa Dzikhamphani wa ṅwaha wa 2023 Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza u ṋetshedzwa ha mvetamveto ya Khwiniso ya Mulayotibe wa Dzikhamphani wa ṅwaha wa 2023 ngei Phalamenndeni u itela uri dzudzanyiwe.

src: Izindululo ezikulo Mthetho uYilwayo zijolise ekunciphiseni umthwalo wommiselo nowolawulo kubanini bamashishini kwaye ziza kukhulisa umtsalane woMzantsi Afrika kwabo banokuba ngabatyali-zimali.
tgt: Makumedzwa ane a khou dzinginywa kha Mulayotibe uyu o livhiswa kha u fhungudza vhukonḓi ha zwa milayo na ndangulo kha vhaṋe vha mabindu nahone a ḓo engedza mbonalo yavhuḓi nahone kungaho vhabindudzi ya shango ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src: UMthetho oYilwayo wonyaka wama-2022 wokuBeka esweni, iNkxaso kunye namaNgenelelo kuRhulumente (i-IMSI) IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo loMthetho oYilwayo we-IMSI wonyaka wama-2022 ukuze uluntu luveze izimvo zalo.
tgt: Mulayotibe wa zwa Vhulavhelesi, Thikhedzo na U dzhenelela (IMSI) wa ṅwaha wa 2022 Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza u anḓadzwa ha mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa IMSI wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha vhadzulapo.

src: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kusetyenziswa njengesisombululo kwimingeni emininzi efunyenwe xa urhulumente ebesebenzisa icandelo le-100 nele-139 loMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika yonyaka we-1996 xa kunyanzeleke ukuba enze njalo ngenxa yokusilela kwamanye amacandelo karhulumente.
tgt: Uyu Mulayotibe u ḓo shumiswa sa wone thandululo ya khaedu nnzhi dzine dza ṱanganiwa nadzo musi muvhuso u tshi thoma u shumisa tshiteṅwa tsha 100 na tsha 139 ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe wa ṅwaha wa 1996 musi u tshi kombetshedzea u ita ngauralo nga mulandu wa u kundelwa kha maṅwe masia a muvhuso.

src: ICandelo le-100 lixhobisa urhulumente ukuba angenelele ukuba iphondo liyasilela ukuhlangabezana nezibophelelo zalo zolawulo nonikezelo lweenkonzo ngelixa iCandelo le-139 lixhobisa isigqeba sephondo esinolawulo oluphezulu ukuba singenelele ukuba umasipala akalufezi uxanduva ngokoMgaqo-siseko okanye ngokomthetho.
tgt: Tshiteṅwa tsha 100 tshi maanḓafhadza muvhuso uri u dzhenelele arali vunḓu ḽi tshi khou kundelwa u swikela vhuḓifhinduleli haḽo ha zwa vhulangi na nḓisedzo ya tshumelo ngeno Tshiteṅwa tsha 139 tshi maanḓafhadza khorotshitumbe ya vunḓu uri i dzhenelele arali masipala u tshi khou kundelwa u ita vhuḓifhinduleli hawo u ya nga mulayo kana Ndayotewa.

src: UMthetho oYilwayo we-IMSI waziswa njengesixhobo sokulawula ukujongana nemingeni ekunyanzeliseni iCandelo le-139, ukubeka iliso novavanyo, kunye nefuthe longenelelo.
tgt: Mulayotibe wa IMSI u khou ḓivhadzwa sa tshishumiswa tsha zwa mulayo tsha u tandulula khaedu dzi re hone kha zwa u thoma u shumiswa ha Tshiteṅwa tsha 139, vhulavhelesi na vhusengulusi, khathihi na masiandaitwa a u dzhenelela.

src: INdebe yeHlabathi yabaseTyhini ye-FIFA yowama-2023 IBanyana Banyana, iiNtshatsheli ze-Afrika ezilawulayo, kunye neqhayiya lesizwe, iza kuthwala amathemba namaphupha oMzantsi Afrika xa ithatha inxaxheba kwiNdebe yeHlabathi yabaseTyhini ye-FIFA yowama-2023 e-New Zealand nase-Australia ukusuka ngomhla wama-20 kweyeKhala ukuya kowama-20 kweyeThupha 2023.
tgt: Mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Bola ya Milenzhe ya Vhafumakadzi ya Ḽifhasi ya dzangano ḽa FIFA ya ṅwaha wa 2023.

src: INdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola yoMnyazi yowama-2023 Kwezi ntsuku zimbalwa zizayo, amehlo ehlabathi lezemidlalo aza kujonga eKapa, eMzantsi Afrika, xa kuqalwa iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola yoMnyazi yowama-2023 ukusuka ngomhla wama-28 kweyeKhala ukuya kowe-6 kweyeThupha.
tgt: Thimu ya Banyana Banyana, ine ya vha yone Dzingweṋa dza Afrika, ya dovha hafhu ya vha yone ine lushaka lwa ḓihudza ngayo, i ḓo hwala fulufhelo na miloro ya Afrika Tshipembe musi i tshi shela mulenzhe kha Mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Bola ya Milenzhe ya Vhafumakadzi ya Ḽifhasi ya vha dzangano ḽa FIFA ya ṅwaha wa 2023 ngei kha shango ḽa New Zealand na ḽa Australia u bva nga ḽa 20 Fulwana u swika nga ḽa 20 Ṱhangule 2023.

src: Issues in the Environment.
tgt: Issues in the Environment.

src: South African National Taxi Council (SANTACO) Western Cape taxi strike Cabinet was briefed about the ongoing impasse between SANTACO Western Cape and the City of Cape Town, which has escalated into a violent strike as a result of the impounding of taxi vehicles by the City of Cape Town.
tgt: South African National Taxi Council (SANTACO) Western Cape taxi strike Cabinet was briefed about the ongoing impasse between SANTACO Western Cape and the City of Cape Town, which has escalated into a violent strike as a result of the impounding of taxi vehicles by the City of Cape Town.

src: Cabinet condemns the violence and anarchy in Cape Town and has called on SANTACO to ensure that its protest action is peaceful and does not interfere with the rights of others.
tgt: Cabinet condemns the violence and anarchy in Cape Town and has called on SANTACO to ensure that its protest action is peaceful and does not interfere with the rights of others.

src: In this regard, we have noted that there were no violent incidents in the last 48-hours.
tgt: In this regard, we have noted that there were no violent incidents in the last 48-hours.

src: However, members of the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies have been directed to ensue violent situation is under control to allow residents safe movement to school, work and their normal daily activities.
tgt: However, members of the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies have been directed to ensue violent situation is under control to allow residents safe movement to school, work and their normal daily activities.

src: Cabinet was also briefed about the City of Cape Town’s imposing of taxi operating conditions which are at variance with both the National Road Traffic, 1996 (Act 93 of 1996) and the National Land Transport Act, 2009 (Act 5 of 2009), which regulate the traffic offences and applicable penalties, including the impounding of vehicles.
tgt: Cabinet was also briefed about the City of Cape Town’s imposing of taxi operating conditions which are at variance with both the National Road Traffic, 1996 (Act 93 of 1996) and the National Land Transport Act, 2009 (Act 5 of 2009), which regulate the traffic offences and applicable penalties, including the impounding of vehicles.

src: Cabinet has directed the Minister of Transport, Ms Sindisiwe Chikunga, to ensure that any taxi operating conditions that contradicts the laws of the Republic are removed.
tgt: Cabinet has directed the Minister of Transport, Ms Sindisiwe Chikunga, to ensure that any taxi operating conditions that contradicts the laws of the Republic are removed.

src: Fight against illegal mining.
tgt: Fight against illegal mining.

src: Cabinet welcomed the deployment of a special police unit, which is supported by the military, in Riverlea, Johannesburg, to deal with illegal mining in the area.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the deployment of a special police unit, which is supported by the military, in Riverlea, Johannesburg, to deal with illegal mining in the area.

src: In addition, Cabinet commended the arrest of over 194 suspects over illegal mining activities and directed law-enforcement agencies to urgently clamp down on this and other serious crimes in the country.
tgt: In addition, Cabinet commended the arrest of over 194 suspects over illegal mining activities and directed law-enforcement agencies to urgently clamp down on this and other serious crimes in the country.

src: The Department of Mineral Resources and Energy (DMRE) has committed to close all derelict open shafts and mine holes in Riverlea by the end of September 2023, whilst finalising plans to close other derelict open shafts and mining holes across the country.
tgt: The Department of Mineral Resources and Energy (DMRE) has committed to close all derelict open shafts and mine holes in Riverlea by the end of September 2023, whilst finalising plans to close other derelict open shafts and mining holes across the country.

src: The security situation in Niger.
tgt: The security situation in Niger.

src: Cabinet has noted the impact the security situation in Niger is having on air-travel between South Africa/Southern Africa and Western Europe, with negative implications for business and individuals alike and the airline industry that is just starting to recover from the devastating ravages of the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic.
tgt: Cabinet has noted the impact the security situation in Niger is having on air-travel between South Africa/Southern Africa and Western Europe, with negative implications for business and individuals alike and the airline industry that is just starting to recover from the devastating ravages of the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic.

src: Cabinet reiterated government’s condemnation of the coup in Niger and the call for the speedy restoration of a democratic order, and also noted the initiative to restore normality under the Economic Community of West African States.
tgt: Cabinet reiterated government’s condemnation of the coup in Niger and the call for the speedy restoration of a democratic order, and also noted the initiative to restore normality under the Economic Community of West African States.

src: Russia-Africa Summit.
tgt: Russia-Africa Summit.

src: President Cyril Ramaphosa was amongst other African leaders who attended the Second Russia-Africa Summit, in St Petersburg in the Russian Federation on 27 and 28 July 2023.
tgt: President Cyril Ramaphosa was amongst other African leaders who attended the Second Russia-Africa Summit, in St Petersburg in the Russian Federation on 27 and 28 July 2023.

src: This summit adopted the Russia-Africa Partnership Forum Action Plan which focuses on strengthening cooperation in areas of politics and security, economics, humanitarian matters, and interests of mutual benefit and prosperity.
tgt: This summit adopted the Russia-Africa Partnership Forum Action Plan which focuses on strengthening cooperation in areas of politics and security, economics, humanitarian matters, and interests of mutual benefit and prosperity.

src: On the sidelines of the summit, African Heads of State and Government who are part of the African Peace Initiative on the conflict between Russia and Ukraine held follow-up talks with President Vladimir Putin on the previously discussed confidence-building measures that will create conditions for a negotiated settlement to ending the war.
tgt: On the sidelines of the summit, African Heads of State and Government who are part of the African Peace Initiative on the conflict between Russia and Ukraine held follow-up talks with President Vladimir Putin on the previously discussed confidence-building measures that will create conditions for a negotiated settlement to ending the war.

src: Presidents Ramaphosa and Putin also held a bilateral meeting and discussed opportunities to increase trade between the two countries, and for the Russian Federation to increase investments in South Africa.
tgt: Presidents Ramaphosa and Putin also held a bilateral meeting and discussed opportunities to increase trade between the two countries, and for the Russian Federation to increase investments in South Africa.

src: BRICS Summit Hosting Readiness.
tgt: BRICS Summit Hosting Readiness.

src: Cabinet was apprised that it is all systems go in terms of South Africa’s readiness to host the 15th BRICS Summit in Johannesburg from 22 to 24 August 2023.
tgt: Cabinet was apprised that it is all systems go in terms of South Africa’s readiness to host the 15th BRICS Summit in Johannesburg from 22 to 24 August 2023.

src: The last of the BRICS Ministerial meetings – the BRICS Ministers of Agriculture Meeting – is currently underway, while the Ministerial Meetings of Foreign Affairs, Security, Trade, Industry, Education, Science, Labour, Communications, Health, and Urbanisation Forum have concluded their reports for the Leaders’ Summit.
tgt: The last of the BRICS Ministerial meetings – the BRICS Ministers of Agriculture Meeting – is currently underway, while the Ministerial Meetings of Foreign Affairs, Security, Trade, Industry, Education, Science, Labour, Communications, Health, and Urbanisation Forum have concluded their reports for the Leaders’ Summit.

src: The BRICS Outreach programmes for various sectors and communities have also been concluded.
tgt: The BRICS Outreach programmes for various sectors and communities have also been concluded.

src: These engagements provided governments, organisations, experts and academics from the BRICS nations an opportunity to discuss issues of mutual interest that will enable informed decision-making during the BRICS Summit.
tgt: These engagements provided governments, organisations, experts and academics from the BRICS nations an opportunity to discuss issues of mutual interest that will enable informed decision-making during the BRICS Summit.

src: National Development Plan (NDP) Ten-Year Review.
tgt: National Development Plan (NDP) Ten-Year Review.

src: Cabinet welcomed the Ten-Year Review of the NDP by the National Planning Commission that pointed out that the economy remained structured in a manner that does not serve the interests of all South Africans, which is a major reason behind increasing levels of poverty and inequality.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the Ten-Year Review of the NDP by the National Planning Commission that pointed out that the economy remained structured in a manner that does not serve the interests of all South Africans, which is a major reason behind increasing levels of poverty and inequality.

src: Government remains committed to restructuring and transforming the economy to serve the interests of all South Africans.
tgt: Government remains committed to restructuring and transforming the economy to serve the interests of all South Africans.

src: Energy.
tgt: Energy.

src: The 25th July marked the First Anniversary since President Ramaphosa announced the Energy Action Plan.
tgt: The 25th July marked the First Anniversary since President Ramaphosa announced the Energy Action Plan.

src: Cabinet welcomed the progress made to date to implement the Energy Action Plan, which continues to register an improvement in the Energy Availability Factor and improvement in the stages of load-shedding.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the progress made to date to implement the Energy Action Plan, which continues to register an improvement in the Energy Availability Factor and improvement in the stages of load-shedding.

src: Tourism Cabinet is pleased that the Tourism statistics for June 2023 show that our tourism sector is slowly but surely recovering from the devastating effects of the COVID-19 pandemic.
tgt: Tourism Cabinet is pleased that the Tourism statistics for June 2023 show that our tourism sector is slowly but surely recovering from the devastating effects of the COVID-19 pandemic.

src: The June 2023 statistics from Statistics South Africa (Stats SA) show that the volume of arrivals, departures and travellers in transit increased for both South African residents and foreign travellers between June 2022 and June 2023.
tgt: The June 2023 statistics from Statistics South Africa (Stats SA) show that the volume of arrivals, departures and travellers in transit increased for both South African residents and foreign travellers between June 2022 and June 2023.

src: Economy Cabinet welcomed Stats SA’s report of a drop in consumer inflation from per cent in May to per cent in June 2023, which is the largest decline since May 2020.
tgt: Economy Cabinet welcomed Stats SA’s report of a drop in consumer inflation from per cent in May to per cent in June 2023, which is the largest decline since May 2020.

src: This drop shows the resilience of our economy, which has been further buoyed by the South Africa Reserve Bank’s decision to leave the repo rate unchanged at 8.25 per cent.
tgt: This drop shows the resilience of our economy, which has been further buoyed by the South Africa Reserve Bank’s decision to leave the repo rate unchanged at 8.25 per cent.

src: South African Sign Language (SASL) Bill.
tgt: South African Sign Language (SASL) Bill.

src: Cabinet welcomed the recent signing into law of the SASL Bill by President Ramaphosa, which made the SASL the 12th official language in South Africa.
tgt: Cabinet welcomed the recent signing into law of the SASL Bill by President Ramaphosa, which made the SASL the 12th official language in South Africa.

src: This will promote the rights of about 600 000 SASL users in South Africa.
tgt: This will promote the rights of about 600 000 SASL users in South Africa.

src: Cabinet Decisions.
tgt: Cabinet Decisions.

src: Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year Cabinet approved the pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year.
tgt: Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year Cabinet approved the pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2023/24 financial year.

src: The crime statistics will be released in August and November 2023 for quarters one and two, and February and May 2024 for quarter three and quarter four respectively.
tgt: The crime statistics will be released in August and November 2023 for quarters one and two, and February and May 2024 for quarter three and quarter four respectively.

src: The frequent release of crime statistics is important for monitoring crime trends and better decision-making in the fight against crime.
tgt: The frequent release of crime statistics is important for monitoring crime trends and better decision-making in the fight against crime.

src: Financial Inclusion Policy Cabinet approved the Financial Inclusion Policy for implementation.
tgt: Financial Inclusion Policy Cabinet approved the Financial Inclusion Policy for implementation.

src: The policy forms part of government’s reforms of the financial sector regulations and in line with the Twin Peaks model of National Treasury.
tgt: The policy forms part of government’s reforms of the financial sector regulations and in line with the Twin Peaks model of National Treasury.

src: The policy, amongst others, aims to ensure better market conduct and the treatment of customers in the financial sector.
tgt: The policy, amongst others, aims to ensure better market conduct and the treatment of customers in the financial sector.

src: The purpose is to ensure that financial institutions conduct business in ways that are fair to customers, prevent practices that undermine the integrity of financial markets, and build confidence in the financial system.
tgt: The purpose is to ensure that financial institutions conduct business in ways that are fair to customers, prevent practices that undermine the integrity of financial markets, and build confidence in the financial system.

src: The implementation of the policy will ensure that the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth and promote access to financial services and financial inclusion for all citizens.
tgt: The implementation of the policy will ensure that the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth and promote access to financial services and financial inclusion for all citizens.

src: It is an acknowledgment that while levels of access have improved in transactional accounts, this has not reflected across many other financial products and services.
tgt: It is an acknowledgment that while levels of access have improved in transactional accounts, this has not reflected across many other financial products and services.

src: The policy is available on the National Treasury website: WEBTOKEN Bills.
tgt: The policy is available on the National Treasury website: WEBTOKEN Bills.

src: National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) Amendment Bill of 2023.
tgt: National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) Amendment Bill of 2023.

src: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft NPA Amendment Bill of 2023 to Parliament.
tgt: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft NPA Amendment Bill of 2023 to Parliament.

src: The Bill amends the NPA Act, 1998 (Act 32 of 1998) to provide for the establishment of the Investigating Directorate as a permanent entity within the NPA and to also strengthen its investigative powers.
tgt: The Bill amends the NPA Act, 1998 (Act 32 of 1998) to provide for the establishment of the Investigating Directorate as a permanent entity within the NPA and to also strengthen its investigative powers.

src: The Regulation of Interception of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Amendment Bill.
tgt: The Regulation of Interception of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Amendment Bill.

src: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft Amendment Bill to Parliament, which amends the Regulation of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Act (RICA), 2002 (Act 70 of 2002).
tgt: Cabinet approved the submission of the draft Amendment Bill to Parliament, which amends the Regulation of Communications and Provision of Communication-related Information Act (RICA), 2002 (Act 70 of 2002).

src: The amendments are largely to provide adequate safeguards to protect the right to privacy, as buttressed by the rights of access to courts, freedom of expression of the media and legal privilege in line with the 2021 Constitutional Court judgement that found the RICA of 2002 to be unconstitutional.
tgt: The amendments are largely to provide adequate safeguards to protect the right to privacy, as buttressed by the rights of access to courts, freedom of expression of the media and legal privilege in line with the 2021 Constitutional Court judgement that found the RICA of 2002 to be unconstitutional.

tgt: AppointmentsAll appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and relevant clearance.

src: Current Event.
tgt: Current Event.

src: Women’s Month.
tgt: Women’s Month.

src: South Africa is commemorating Women’s Month in August under the theme: “Accelerating socio-economic opportunities for empowerment of women” to pay tribute to the more than 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in 1956 to protest against the oppressive pass laws of the apartheid government.
tgt: South Africa is commemorating Women’s Month in August under the theme: “Accelerating socio-economic opportunities for empowerment of women” to pay tribute to the more than 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in 1956 to protest against the oppressive pass laws of the apartheid government.

src: Cabinet calls on South Africans to use the month not to only honour women who fought for our freedom but to also play our part to building a society that supports women empowerment and guarantees the safety of women and children.
tgt: Cabinet calls on South Africans to use the month not to only honour women who fought for our freedom but to also play our part to building a society that supports women empowerment and guarantees the safety of women and children.

src: Messages.
tgt: Messages.

src: CongratulationsCabinet extends its congratulations and well wishes to: Netball Spar Proteas, for making it to the top six in the Netball World Cup.
tgt: CongratulationsCabinet extends its congratulations and well wishes to: Netball Spar Proteas, for making it to the top six in the Netball World Cup.

src: Cabinet called on all South Africans to use such unifying moments as an opportunity to reach out to fellow South Africans to build social cohesions and promote nation-building in a society where everyone feels welcomeBanyana Banyana, for making history by advancing to the last 16 of the 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup.
tgt: Cabinet called on all South Africans to use such unifying moments as an opportunity to reach out to fellow South Africans to build social cohesions and promote nation-building in a society where everyone feels welcomeBanyana Banyana, for making history by advancing to the last 16 of the 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup.

src: Their incredible feats on the sporting field inspired the nation and they have flown the country’s flag high.
tgt: Their incredible feats on the sporting field inspired the nation and they have flown the country’s flag high.
